Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Family | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays, Tuesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: December 17, 2012

Bad Santas follows some unemployed men in their 50's as they are put through their paces at the country's most successful Santa School. Only the best though will make it into the grottos in time for Christmas.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33589)
